//: Generated by fleet-terraform-generator - DO NOT EDIT

custom_options_yaml.description:
Specify custom configuration options for the Entity Analytics input. See
[Entity Analytics](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/beats/filebeat/current/filebeat-input-entity-analytics.html)
for details.

dataset.description: Select the dataset to collect from Microsoft Entra ID.

enable_request_tracer.description: The request tracer logs requests and responses to the agent's local file-system for debugging configurations. Enabling this request tracing compromises security and should only be used for debugging. See [documentation](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/beats/filebeat/current/filebeat-input-entity-analytics.html#_tracer_enabled) for details.

fleet_agent_policy_id.description: Agent policy ID to add the package policy to.

fleet_data_stream_namespace.description: Namespace to use for the data stream.

fleet_package_policy_description.description: Description to use for the package policy.

fleet_package_policy_name_suffix.description: Suffix to append to the end of the package policy name.

fleet_package_version.description: Version of the entityanalytics_entra_id package to use.

http_client_timeout.description: Duration before declaring that the HTTP client connection has timed out. Valid time units are ns, us, ms, s, m, h.

preserve_duplicate_custom_fields.description: Preserve entityanalytics_entra_id.user and entityanalytics_entra_id.device fields that were copied to Elastic Common Schema (ECS) fields.

preserve_original_event.description: Preserves a raw copy of the original event, added to the field `event.original`.

processors_yaml.description: Processors are used to reduce the number of fields in the exported event or to enhance the event with metadata. This executes in the agent before the logs are parsed. See [Processors](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/beats/filebeat/current/filtering-and-enhancing-data.html) for details.

proxy_url.description: URL to proxy connections in the form of http[s]://<user>:<password>@<server name/ip>:<port>. Please ensure your username and password are in URL encoded format.

ssl_yaml.description: SSL configuration options. See [documentation](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/beats/filebeat/current/configuration-ssl.html#ssl-common-config) for details.

sync_interval.description:
How often full synchronizations should occur. Must be greater than
Update Interval. Expected value is a duration string (15m, 1h, 1m30,
etc), defaults to 24h.

update_interval.description:
How often incremental updates should occur. Must be less than Sync
Interval. Expected value is a duration string (15m, 1h, 1m30, etc),
defaults to 15m.
